text: Thank you for the interview tips!! I never thought I was meant to give my importance to the person asking me the question, I always assumed you had to maintain eye contact with all the interviewers at once - no wonder I would get so worked up and anxious :sweat_smile:

Wow, these tips are so useful! And, regarding the stage at which I get to ask questions, do you think it would be a good idea to take a mini notepad to take notes to show that I'm going to ensure I make use of the feedback/answers I get? Or would that be overdoing it..
Thank youuu so much! I appreciate your acknowledgement of my hard work and abilities :slightly_smiling_face: I try to do my best
I also mentioned how great you are, to Dexter, :smile:  you made everything a lot simpler and have given me great advice and tips that I have been able to apply!
I think I'm ready to work on the *STAR/AR* technique on how to answer interview questions!
Aside from my interview stuff, out of curiosity, what course did you do at uni? How was it? And what interested you in becoming an interview coach?
